title: Revert application to Version 62 state

requirements.text: Restore all backend code to the exact state from Version 62, including main.mo with all data structures, functions, and logic as they existed in that version

quotes: Revert entire app code and UI to version 62 fully

acceptanceCriteria: Backend main.mo matches Version 62 implementation exactly
All backend data structures and functions are restored to Version 62 state

requirements.text: Restore all frontend components, styles, and functionality to the exact state from Version 62, removing any changes introduced in Version 63

quotes: Revert entire app code and UI to version 62 fully

acceptanceCriteria: All frontend components match Version 62 implementation
UI appearance and behavior are identical to Version 62
No Version 63 frontend features or changes remain

acceptanceCriteria: TextFormattingManager component is removed from the admin panel

quotes: Revert entire app code and UI to version 62 fully

acceptanceCriteria: Text formatting query and update functions are removed from backend
Text formatting state variables are removed from backend
